tool.name: pRESTO AlignSets
tool.description: Multiple-align sequences with the same barcodes.
tool.command: #if '$methodo' == "muscle" ln -s '$fastq_in' in.fastq && #else if '$methodo == "table" ln -s '$primer_fa primer.fasta && #end if echo "the method is ***************** $methodo********************** " && AlignSets.py '$methodo' --nproc "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" --outname=tmp #if '$methodo' == "muscle" -s in.fastq --bf '$bf' $div #else if $methodo == "table" -p '$primer_fa' --exec $(which muscle) $reverse #end if #if $capture_log --log '$log_out' #end if

param.name: methodo
param.label: Alignment method
param.help: This step is to correct missalignment that is due to different primers in the multiplex pool having been incorporated into the same UMI read group during amplification if the primers are sufficiently similar.
param.option: Align sequence sets using predefined 5' offset (offset)
Create a 5' offset table by primer multiple alignment (table)

param.name: fastq_in
param.label: Input FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ file of sequences with barcodes/UMIs in an annotation.

param.label: Barcode Field
param.help: Name of the annotation field which contains the barcode/UMI sequence.

param.label: Calculate Nucleotide Diversity
param.help: Specify to calculate nucleotide diversity of each set.

param.name: primer_fa
param.label: The primer field to use for offset assignment.

param.name: reverse
param.label: reverse 5' to 3'
param.help: If specified create a 3â€™ offset table instead

tool.help:
Multiple aligns sequences with the same barcode to correct for any misalignments due to either different primer usage or insertions/deletions in the sequences.
Only supports the "muscle" sub-command of pRESTO's AlignSets.py.
See the `pRESTO online help <@PRESTO_BASE_URL@/en/stable>`_ for more information.
@HELP_NOTE@
